messages.subject: Toronto reporter looking for a black hs family (deadline 1-31)
messages.msgSnippet: I ve just had a call from Carla Wintersgill, a Canadian newspaper reporter preparing an article on black homeschooling families for The Globe & Mail. I offered
messages.messageBody:
I've just had a call from Carla Wintersgill, a Canadian newspaper
reporter preparing an article on black homeschooling families for The
Globe & Mail. I offered to pass along her message below. Even though
she asked re homeschooling, it would be great if there's a black
unschooling family she could talk with. Her deadline is tomorrow
afternoon (January 30).

Here's her message:

Hi there,

My name is Carla Wintersgill and I'm writing an article for the Globe
and Mail about Africentric homeschooling. I was hoping to speak with a
black family in Toronto who had decided to homeschool their children.
Would you be able to put me in touch with someone? My number is 416
574-4632, please give me a call or e-mail me at cwintersgill@...

Thanks very much,
Carla
